body:
Christian,

I was browsing through the EnergyPlus reference and I realized that there may be a simpler way to get a dynamic U-Value with this object:

[http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/input-output-reference/pa...](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/input-output-reference/page-010.html#materialpropertyvariablethermalconductivity)

I don't have time to fully test it out now but I would suggest looking there before going for the EMS option.

-Chris
